virtual void codec_knobs (Knob_Callback cb)=0

Detailed Description

This is a codec format handler interface. Subclasses should implement codec_knobs() just as an Op would.

Member Function Documentation

virtual std::string DD::Image::CodecHandler::codec_name ( ) const
pure virtual

Get the current codec name associated with the format container
